name: Stuck In Arcade
description:
This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. Theme: Let There Be Chaos

Game is made by Reiko Tennosaar - YouTube

Your only goal is to stay alive long as possible and get many kills as you can. If you are not fast enough too many enemies will come after you and you will be in the middle of a chaos.

Controls: WASD and MOUSE
